description: Temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies on an as and when requested basis
full_summary:
# Government Tender Opportunity
## Request for Standing Offer

**EW479-212558-G Temporary Help Services - Northern Alberta**
### Solicitation Number
* WS4550960455

**Tender Information**

* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-08T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-06-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-05-31

**Contract Requirements**

* Temporary help services will be provided to federal government departments and agencies in one or more of the geographical areas listed in the Statement of Work.
* The services will be required on an as and when basis.
* A Voluntary Set-Aside for Aboriginal Business is included in this procurement.

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**:
	+ 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	+ Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information**

* **Contact Name**: Andrew Hemy
* **Contact Email**: andrew.hemy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19479129?extsite=MTk0NzkxMjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 8, 2024 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
### Region of Opportunity
 None noted.
